title: Vuelta a España stage 13: Jumbo-Visma crushes rivals with Vingegaard, Kuss, Roglič Pyrénéan sweep
content:
Jumbo-Visma lands devastating blow with 1-2-3 on the Tourmalet that locks out GC podium, Evenepoel drops inside first 50km of multi-mountain stage.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 13: Jumbo-Visma crushes rivals with Vingegaard, Kuss, Roglič Pyrénéan sweep on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
